string-array.name: frequency_options
string-array.item: 30 minutes
hour
two hours
six hours
day

string-array.name: angry_phrases
string-array.item: I told you to stop checking your phone
You son of a b****... get off your phone!
Don\'t waste your life on your stupid cellphone
Quit checking your phone, you make me sick
F**k you, get off your phone
If you don\'t get off your phone right now, you\'re going to regret it
STOP CHECKING YOUR PHONE
SERIOUSLY, STOP CHECKING YOUR PHONE
BOOOOOOO! You\'re seriously disappointing me right now
Imagine what you could achieve in all those wasted hours if you just put your damn phone down?
Warning: You\'re wasting your day
Warning: You\'re wasting your day
Let us make your future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow\'s reality. Get off your f***ing phone.
Seize the day. Get off your phone.
WTF. So that\'s how it\'s going to be... You\'re going to just keep spending time on your phone.

string-array.name: gentle_reminders
string-array.item: Hey good looking, don\'t you think it is time to put that phone away?
I hope you\'re having a wonderful day! Let\'s make it a special one, and not waste too much time on our phone, ok?
It would be lovely if you\'d put your phone down, thanks!
Just a gentle reminder that you\'re looking at your phone a bit too often!
Excuse me, but haven\'t you spent enough time on your phone?
I\'d really appreciate it if you\'d put your phone away for a bit, thanks!
I\'d sure love it if you\'d put your phone away!
Ahem.
Come on now, you have better things to do.
Is this really helping?
Think of the progress you\'re losing.
Imagine the brain fog if you keep going.
Will you care about this in 5 hours? 5 days? 5 years? Put down the phone!
Is this really what you want for yourself?
When you\'re old and looking back on your life, what do you want to look back on? Wasting your life on your phone is no way to live.
You are what you do. Do something meaningful, and don\'t waste your time.
Don\'t waste your time, or time will waste you. Get off your phone.
Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts.
Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present. Get off your phone.
There is nothing impossible to him who will try - Alexander the Great
Don\'t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant. With that in mind, get off your phone.
Your future depends on what you do today.
Wake up and live. - Bob Marley
You only get one life. Use it wisely.
Time is the most important thing you have.
